source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Forest Fairy Watercolor Manga Portrait Painting Course
items.headline: Overcome the challenges of watercolor manga portraits and take control of your painting!
objectives_summary: Techniques which will make your manga portraits more outstanding.
How to paint this forest fairy from line art to finish.
How to mix skin color with just a basic color pallette.

items.title: The Magic of Colour Mixing in Acrylic
items.headline: Getting to Grips with Colour to Enhance Your Paintings
objectives_summary: The principles of colour mixing
Mixing complementary colours
Making tints, tones and shades

items.title: Drawing: How to Draw Cartoon Characters, Sketching
items.headline: Cartoon Drawing & Art Course with sketches, Figure Drawing
objectives_summary: During this Course Drawing Cartoon Characters with Imagination

items.title: Kids, Open Your Art Shop Today!
items.headline: Create & Sell Your Handmade Crafts
objectives_summary: Identify the type of business they want to start.
Determine the types of artistic creations they will sell.
List the 10 steps to developing a small business.

items.title: Realistic portrait pencil drawing Pencil Sketch
items.headline: Portrait pencil drawing for all skill levels
objectives_summary: The way of see things and improve your knowledge in drawing.
To draw and understand roundness and three-dimensionality in pencil drawing.
How I simplify the complexion and how things are constructed.

items.title: Paint an Easy Haunted House with Watercolors
items.headline: Beginner friendly halloween watercolor class with line art template. Learn to paint a haunted house in less than a hour!
objectives_summary: How to Paint a Haunted House Within an Hour
Watercolor Painting Techniques
How to Sketch the Line Art of the Haunted House

items.title: Make Your Own Needle Felted Gifts
items.headline: Kickstart Your Needle Felting, Learn a Relaxing Hobby and Create Personalised Gifts for Your Friends & Family!
objectives_summary: Needle felting basics
What tools and wool to use
Create felted gift items: smiley, hanging rainbow heart, mushroom and teddy bear

items.title: Origami, Japanese Paper crafts ‐ Free Beginner course
items.headline: Origami basic course. You can learn the proper method of 10 kinds of origami in a very easy-to-understand manner.
objectives_summary: Learn how to fold more than 10 origami papers such as planes, letters and cranes!
Basic way to fold origami
Communication using origami

items.title: 10 Things you need to know about essential oils
items.headline: DISCOVER THE ESSENTIALS OF ESSENTIAL OILS
objectives_summary: 10 THINGS You need to know before you buy essential oils
Discover the marketing MYTHS that surround essential oils
SAVE $$$ with my top tips and avoid bad purchase decisions

items.title: Changing colors - A Photo to Oil Painting Workshop

visible_instructors.title: Mandar Marathe
visible_instructors.name: Mandar
visible_instructors.job_title: Fine Artist, Sculptor, Illustrator, and Engineer

items.headline: Experience the transformation of a simple photo to an artwork!
objectives_summary: Learn to visualize a painting based on a photo
Learn to make value sketch and color sketch based on the photo
Learn to prepare an underpainting.

items.title: Silk thread bangles and earrings course
items.headline: Silk thread bangles and earrings
objectives_summary: Handmade silk thread jewellery

items.title: Painting Eucalyptus Flowers in Watercolour
items.headline: How to create detailed and beautiful Eucalyptus flowers in watercolour
objectives_summary: To paint red Eucalyptus flowers in watercolour
To observe a Eucalyptus specimen, look at light and shade, and do a tonal sketch
To mix watercolour paint and create colour swatches

items.title: Draw digital art portraits - How to draw an eye
items.headline: Using any art software and only 4 standard brushes, learn to draw digital portraits
objectives_summary: How to set up your art software
Warming up techniques
Accurately sketch a subject
